# Make and model data

```{r}
vehicles_1979 = get_stats19(year = 1979, type = "vehicle")
names(vehicles_1979)
summary(vehicles_1979$collision_year)
summary(is.na(vehicles_1979$generic_make_model))
summary(as.factor(vehicles_1979$generic_make_model))
```
